project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file and identify numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mean for the numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for the numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for the numerical columns
Write tests for the data analysis functions (mean, median, mode) and CSV reading functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
